name: Mammut Ophir 3 Slide Harness - Men's
description: A low-profile, versatile harness for all-round rock climbing and gym routes, the Ophir 3 is designed for all-day comfort and breathability. 2-part webbing in the waistbelt distributes the load over the entire width of the belt, while 2-layer foam construction provides comfort and stability for working routes or at hanging belays.Self-locking buckles on the waist and legs for safety and ease of use.Lower tie-in point has a protector to prevent abrasion and add good safety margins.Tie-in point and belay loop wear indicators show red threads when excessively worn.Adjustable leg loops with drop seat for ease of use while wearing layers or crampons.
